title: Riot kayle skin glitch?

replies.body: There are a lot of accounts to gift right now, so it may be a bit before getting it all.  You may not receive everything at the same time, per our [support ticker ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-)which you can use to stay up to date.  Hang tight and you'll get the goods!
I only got an animation when I got my icon.  Also, the gifts are going out individually and you should have them all by 9/23.
